price: 84. (Xus) maalintaan ka soo saareyno ummad walba markhaati, markaas aan loo idmeyn kuwa gaaloobay (cudur daarasho), oo aan laga yeeleyn inay axsaan fal dalbaan.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَبۡعَثُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ شَهِيدٗا ثُمَّ لَا يُؤۡذَنُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayawma nabʿathu min kulli ummatin shahīdan thumma lā yu'dhanu lilladhīna kafarū walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
translations: will be asked to make amends
